description: Number of permutations of length n with spread 2.
references: Graham, R. L.; Lehmer, D. H. On the permanent of Schur's matrix. J. Austral. Math. Soc. Ser. A 21 (1976), no. 4, 487-497.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Graham, R. L.; Lehmer, D. H., On the Permanent of Schur's Matrix, Jour. Australian Math. Soc. 21 (series A) (1976), 487-497.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), May 17 2007
